name: Mushrune
description:
Mushrune is a game about farming mushrooms! In it, you are tasked with farming a variety of mushroom types. Unlike other farming games, in this one you can breed two different mushrooms to turn them into a new type of mushroom. 

  • Plant and Water mushrooms so they grow and spread
  • Breed primary mushrooms to find new rare types of mushrooms
  • Spread mushrooms to maximize your profits

Player character standing in their field of mushroom crops
  • Sell the rare mushrooms and purchase helpful gear!

 

The game's shop, including the 5 primary color mushrooms, 8 pets (dog, cat, frog, duck, cow, pig, chicken, and sheep), a chest, and one of each piece of armor (helmet, chestplate, gloves, pants, and boots)
  • Create designs by strategically planting and spreading mushrooms
  • Collect tiny mushroom pets
Player character standing next to a cow pet, a duck pet, and a dog pet
  • Take all the time you need! Time only passes when you perform actions

Art assets from World of Solaria packs by Jamie Brownhill

Health Bar Border and Heart Icon from Brackeys

We would greatly appreciate if you would fill out our playtest form if you do play the game! Thank you! :)
